trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_SEQ_00<tab>Y'shtola is appraising the voidgate with a scholarly eye.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Varshahn at the High Crucible of Al-Kimiya.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Varshahn again.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_GRAHATIA_000_000<tab>Perhaps I might linger a touch longer...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_URIANGER_000_001<tab>Even in the learned halls of Sharlayan, 'tis forbidden to throw wide the gates to the abyss. The peril is far too great...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ESTINIEN_000_002<tab>Can such a tiny portal truly be so dangerous?
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_003<tab>I expect you have more questions...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_MATSYA_000_004<tab>My boat is at your disposal!
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_Q1_000_005<tab>Proceed to Weaver's Warding?
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_GRAHATIA_000_050<tab>The Thirteenth... What chaos must consume that world...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_URIANGER_000_055<tab>Vrtra's grief for a lost sibling will be no mystery to Estinien. His hath been a life entwined with sorrow, even before he became host to Nidhogg's essence.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ESTINIEN_000_060<tab>I wondered how one of the first brood could simply vanish and leave no trace of her passage. Now I have my answer.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_065<tab>Millennia have passed since last I saw her. But I see Azdaja in memory still, clear and vivid...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_070<tab>So they managed not only to expand the fissure, but also manipulate it as one might a gate...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_071<tab>Astonishing. Is there any chance I could learn more of how this feat was accomplished?

TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_072<tab>I will tell you what I can. First, however, I must return to the High Crucible, and arrange to replace the guardians you so handily destroyed. It will not do to leave the gate undefended.

TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_073<tab>Ah, my apologies─we were perhaps a touch zealous in our rush to uncover the vault's secrets. If the constructs can be repaired, we would be happy to offer our assistance...?

TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_074<tab>That will not be necessary. Much as I retain spare vessels for myself, we keep duplicate guardians on hand for such eventualities. In any case, we should return to Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_GRAHATIA_000_100<tab>While I am loath to keep Krile waiting much longer, I cannot bring myself to leave before hearing more of Vrtra's tale...

TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_URIANGER_000_105<tab>'Twas a most enjoyable expedition, for which I am grateful. As for mine evaluation, I shall impress upon the Loporrits that a treasure vault is incomplete without daunting sentinels to test the mettle of any would-be intruders.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ESTINIEN_000_110<tab>Vrtra speaks as if Azdaja is a lost cause. But I wager he feels differently in his heart of hearts.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_115<tab>There is much about the voidgate that I cannot even begin to explain. I must convince Vrtra to share everything he knows...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ALCHEMIST04530_000_120<tab>This is quite the gathering. To what do we owe the pleasure...?
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_130<tab>I promise we will discuss the voidgate further, but first I must attend to the matter of the vault's sentinels.

TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_131<tab>As your instruments have no doubt informed you, the Kapikulu has been reduced to so much scrap. Please bring a new one out of storage, and see that it is conveyed to its post along with some few lesser constructs.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ALCHEMIST04530_100_131<tab>Was it tomb robbers? Fiends born of the Tower of Zot? By the Sisters, do not tell me a blasphemy yet roams free!
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ALCHEMIST04530_000_132<tab>Why such guilty faces!? Surely it isn't <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who are responsible for this... Oh.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ALCHEMIST04530_000_133<tab>Ahem, well...the details aren't important! I shall see it done immediately.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_134<tab>And with that, the vault will soon be secure once more. Now, I believe you had questions?
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_135<tab>Quite a few, in fact. But I'd like to begin with the gate itself. It is still functional, yes?
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_136<tab>Indeed, which is why I saw it sealed with an alchemically forged lock and warded it with my magicks. Such power must not fall into the wrong hands.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_137<tab>In truth, the primary reason for the vault's construction was to keep the gate hidden from the outside world.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ESTINIEN_000_138<tab>So much effort for such a little door.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_139<tab>That “little door” you speak of leads to an abyss teeming with unspeakable horrors.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_140<tab>That said, in its current state, it would admit only the lowliest of voidsent. And from this side, no man would be able to pass through.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ESTINIEN_000_141<tab>No man? I should think Alphinaud would fit, given a firm enough push.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_142<tab>Physical size is only one consideration. The true restriction hinges upon the aetheric density of the soul in transit.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_143<tab>And yet you succeeded in expanding this diminutive portal and sending your simulacrum to the Thirteenth...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_144<tab>Thanks to my brilliant alchemists. I should have destroyed the anomaly when I found it, but instead, I bade them devise a means to control it.

TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_145<tab>After much experimentation, they accomplished the impossible. A method was conceived by which my magicks could manipulate the fissure and transform it into a serviceable gate.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_146<tab>But the process has long since been forgotten. Once I had given up searching for Azdaja, there was no need to preserve such esoteric and dangerous knowledge.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_147<tab>Thus has the gate lain dormant, for years uncounted.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_GRAHATIA_000_148<tab>Our own passage to the Thirteenth was made relatively simple thanks to the Crystal Tower.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_GRAHATIA_000_149<tab>An ancient mechanism channeled the tower's vast stores of energy to open a voidgate─one bound to a covenant made with the Cloud of Darkness.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_GRAHATIA_000_150<tab>Once that sovereign entity was beaten back, however, the covenant was broken, and the doorway severed from its connection to the void.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_GRAHATIA_000_151<tab>Theoretically, it should be possible to reconnect the gate by forging a new pact with another voidsent...but such deals usually end in betrayal and death.

TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_152<tab>You seem to have struck a bargain of your own, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Though it serves you well in battle, be aware that the beneficial nature of your “arrangement” is the exception which proves the rule.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_153<tab>In any case, we should attempt to gain an understanding of the Bounty gate. Mayhap you could resume the search for your sister...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_154<tab>As I have already explained, I put those futile hopes to rest centuries ago. My place─and my duty─is here now.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_155<tab>Ah, I had meant to ask... What prompted you to search for the vault in the first place?
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_A1_000_001<tab>To see if the legends were true.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_A1_000_002<tab>It was all Estinien's idea.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_157<tab>As you have seen, the “fabulous wealth” from the stories is quite real, if not its rumored origin. But I'm afraid I must assert a prior claim.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_158<tab>I've been adding to that trove for years, little by little. But the time has come to spend it, that I might alleviate my people's suffering.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ESTINIEN_100_158<tab>As I recall, 'twas you who was chasing tales of undersea ruins.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_200_158<tab>Well, as you have seen, the “fabulous wealth” from the stories is quite real, if not its rumored origin. But I'm afraid I must assert a prior claim.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_300_158<tab>I've been adding to that trove for years, little by little. But the time has come to spend it, that I might alleviate my people's suffering.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ESTINIEN_000_159<tab>Then we are of one mind. We had no intention of taking it for ourselves.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ESTINIEN_000_160<tab>Isn't that right, my friend?
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_161<tab>Your Excellency. Would you object if I were to conduct a closer examination of the gate? I will make no attempt to open it, of course.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_162<tab>I owe you and yours a debt that can never be repaid. Whatever boon you ask of me, you shall have it.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_163<tab>You are most gracious. I shall take full advantage of your permission.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_URIANGER_000_164<tab>Would that I could join thee in thy study, but the Loporrits will be anxious to receive my report. I beg my leave of you.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_GRAHATIA_000_165<tab>And I must be off to Sharlayan, as well.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_GRAHATIA_000_166<tab>Mistress Krile was eager to speak with you about that request, so please come back to the annex as soon as you are able. Farewell for now!
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_YSHTOLA_000_167<tab>We can discuss my findings once I return. You'll not be rid of me so easily.

TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_SYSTEM_000_170<tab>You may now undertake the Chronicles of a New Era quest series “Myths of the Realm.” Speak with the fresh-faced Student at the Baldesion Annex to accept the first quest.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ESTINIEN_000_200<tab>I hope you enjoyed the expedition, at least. Otherwise it was a heavy purse to pay for a treasure map leading to a treasure we couldn't keep.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_210<tab>The difficult part in all this will be deciding how best to put these riches to use...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_211<tab>Will you lend me your assistance in these deliberations?
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_A2_000_001<tab>Of course.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_A2_000_002<tab>Anything to make up for the constructs we broke...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_213<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_VARSHAHN_000_214<tab>Then think of your employment as recompense. Serve me as guest advisors, and I will consider the broken constructs paid for in full.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_ESTINIEN_000_215<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I are in this together. I will follow <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> example.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_SYSTEM_000_250<tab>Meanwhile, elsewhere...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_EARTHMONOLITH_000_250<tab>(-Throne of Earth-)I sssensed the breaching of a gate, but it was not inssstigated from this ssside. 'Twas thrown open from the other...
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_FIREMONOLITH_000_251<tab>(-Throne of Fire-)I, too, felt it. A rare occurrence, yes, but such a tiny portal is beneath our notice. There are more pressing matters at hand.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_FIREMONOLITH_000_252<tab>(-Throne of Fire-)An opportunity is upon us, the coming of which we have awaited for nigh on ten thousand years. We dare not let it slip our grasp.

TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_WINDMONOLITH_000_253<tab>(-Throne of Wind-)Yet we must not underestimate <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> who bested the Cloud of Darkness. Even restrained by a covenant, the Cloud was no feeble wisp to be dispersed by some flesh-and-blood mortal.

TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_WATERMONOLITH_000_254<tab>(-Throne of Water-)Bah, let <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> come! I will drown the world and watch this fleshling gasp for breath in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> final moments!
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_BLACKKNIGHT_000_255<tab>(-Knight in Black-)Your zeal is admirable, but forget not our cause.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_BLACKKNIGHT_000_256<tab>(-Knight in Black-)Think back on our struggles beneath this sunless sky. Remember why we cede not our will to fight.
TEXT_AKTKMH105_04530_BLACKKNIGHT_000_257<tab>(-Knight in Black-)'Tis time we set the war in motion, and win redemption for our star!
